name: poap-vote-server
description: Polling based on POAP token ownership

scripts.test: export NODE_ENV=test && export POAP_VOTE_PORT=3001 && sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && sequelize db:migrate && mocha ./test/*-test.js --exit --require @babel/register
scripts.init-dev-db: createuser poapu && createdb poapvote --owner=poapu && createdb poapvote_test --owner=poapu
